segment.source: How to Add or Remove an Administrator by Using the Management Console
segment.target: How to Add or Remove an Administrator by Using the Management Console

segment.source: How to Add or Remove an Administrator by Using the Management Console
segment.target: How to Add or Remove an Administrator by Using the Management Console

segment.source: How to Add or Remove an Administrator by Using the Management Console
segment.target: How to Add or Remove an Administrator by Using the Management Console

segment.source: Use the following procedures to add or remove an administrator on the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 server.
segment.target: Use the following procedures to add or remove an administrator on the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 server.

segment.source: To add an administrator using the Management Console
segment.target: To add an administrator using the Management Console

segment.source: Open the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 Management Console and click Administrators in the navigation pane.
segment.target: Open the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 Management Console and click Administrators in the navigation pane.

segment.source: The navigation pane displays a list of Access Directory (AD) users and groups that currently have administrative access to the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 server.
segment.target: The navigation pane displays a list of Access Directory (AD) users and groups that currently have administrative access to the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 server.

segment.source: To add a new administrator, click Add Administrator Type the name of the administrator that you want to add in the Active Directory Name field.
segment.target: To add a new administrator, click Add Administrator Type the name of the administrator that you want to add in the Active Directory Name field.

segment.source: Ensure you provide the associated user account domain name.
segment.target: Ensure you provide the associated user account domain name.

segment.source: For example, DomainUserName.
segment.target: For example, DomainUserName.

segment.source: Select the account that you want to add and click Add.
segment.target: Select the account that you want to add and click Add.

segment.source: The new account is displayed in the list of server administrators.
segment.target: The new account is displayed in the list of server administrators.

segment.source: To remove an administrator using the Management Console
segment.target: To remove an administrator using the Management Console

segment.source: Open the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 Management Console and click Administrators in the navigation pane.
segment.target: Open the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 Management Console and click Administrators in the navigation pane.

segment.source: The navigation pane displays a list of AD users and groups that currently have administrative access to the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 server.
segment.target: The navigation pane displays a list of AD users and groups that currently have administrative access to the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 server.

segment.source: Right-click the account to be removed from the list of administrators and select Remove.
segment.target: Right-click the account to be removed from the list of administrators and select Remove.
